name: My Girlfriend is a Futanari
description:
Futa on Male
One day, by complete happenstance you stumble upon your soulmate. 💘
She's everything you were looking for, and so, so much more...
The two of you hit it off, and a beautiful relationship starts to blossom.
Can you feel the butterflies?
Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.GameplayKinetic Visual Novel
H-Scenes
~5K words
Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
